events.name: InventoryItemAdded
events.description: Captures the event of adding a new item to inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemRemoved
events.description: Captures the event of removing an item from inventory.

events.name: InventoryItemUpdated
events.description: Captures changes to attributes of an inventory item.

events.name: InventoryItemChecked
events.description: Records the action of checking the details of a specific inventory item.

events.name: InventoryStockLevelChanged
events.description: Captures adjustments made to stock levels due to sales or restocking.

commands.name: AddInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures the event of adding a new item to inventory.

commands.name: RemoveInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures the event of removing an item from inventory.

commands.name: UpdateInventoryItem
commands.description: Captures changes to attributes of an inventory item.

commands.name: CheckInventoryItem
commands.description: Records the action of checking the details of a specific inventory item.

commands.name: AdjustStockLevel
commands.description: Captures adjustments made to stock levels due to sales or restocking.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with supplier management to keep inventory updated with incoming supplies.

integrationPoints.name: OrderManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with order management to adjust inventory based on sales.

integrationPoints.name: ShippingManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with shipping systems to track inventory as it moves in and out.
